mapper.select: select t1.ID id,t1.PARENT_ID parentId,t1.MENU_NAME menuName,t1.MENU_URL menuUrl,t1.MENU_ICON menuIcon, t1.MENU_ORDER menuOrder ,t1.MENU_ENABLE menuEnable,t1.IS_LEFT isLeft , IFNULL(t2.MENU_NAME,'根菜单') parentName from MN_SYS_MENU t1 LEFT JOIN MN_SYS_MENU t2 on t1.PARENT_ID = t2.ID where t1.ID = #{0}

select ID id,PARENT_ID parentId,MENU_NAME menuName,MENU_URL menuUrl,MENU_ICON menuIcon,MENU_LEVEL menuLevel, MENU_ORDER menuOrder,MENU_ENABLE menuEnable,IS_LEFT isLeft from mn_sys_menu where IS_DELETED = 0
and PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
and ID in ( select PERMISSION_ID from sys_role_permission where PERMISSION_TYPE = 2 and ROLE_ID in ( select ROLE_ID from mn_sys_user_role where USER_ID = (select ID from mn_sys_user where USER_NAME = #{loginName}) ) )
order by MENU_ORDER asc
